Class ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.ScoreBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class ScoreBoard, which stores scoreboard entries from a serialized file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewScore(Player playerModel)
      Adds the new, score taking in a player object as a parameter, and then calls the new entry's addNewScore method using the player's information.
      void addNewScore(ScoreBoardEntry newEntry)
      Adds the new entry to the arrayList, sorts it in descending order, and removes the 11th element if it exists, keeping the top 10 scores.
      private int calculateFinalPlayerScore(Player playerModel)
      Calculate final player score by adding remaining health, the number of interactables collected, and the number of questions correct.

      • ScoreBoard

        public ScoreBoard()
        Instantiates a new score board. creates an arrayList of ScoreBoardEntry objects

    • Method Detail

      • addNewScore

        public void addNewScore(ScoreBoardEntry newEntry)
        Adds the new entry to the arrayList, sorts it in descending order, and removes the 11th element if it exists, keeping the top 10 scores.
        Parameters:
        newEntry - the new entry to add

      • addNewScore

        public void addNewScore(Player playerModel)
        Adds the new, score taking in a player object as a parameter, and then calls the new entry's addNewScore method using the player's information.
        Parameters:
        playerModel - the player

      • calculateFinalPlayerScore

        private int calculateFinalPlayerScore(Player playerModel)
        Calculate final player score by adding remaining health, the number of interactables collected, and the number of questions correct.
        Parameters:
        playerModel - the player
        Returns:
        the calculated score of the player
